tns:patch.author: Diego Dimunzio
tns:patch.description: 1 - Update component funding view 2 - Update component view

script.lang: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_component_funding AS select f.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, f.amp_component_funding_id AS amp_component_funding_id, f.amp_component_funding_id AS amp_fund_detail_id, ct.category_value AS component_type, f.transaction_type AS transaction_type, f.adjustment_type AS adjustment_type, f.transaction_date AS transaction_date, f.transaction_amount AS transaction_amount, f.currency_id AS currency_id, cu.currency_code AS currency_code from amp_component_funding f join amp_components c join amp_currency cu join amp_category_value ct where cu.amp_currency_id = f.currency_id and f.amp_component_id = c.amp_component_id and ct.id = c.type order by f.amp_activity_id;

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_componente AS select ac.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, s.sectorname AS name, s.amp_sector_id AS amp_sector_id, s.sector_percentage AS percentage from amp_components ac join v_sectors s on ac.amp_activity_id = s.amp_activity_id order by ac.amp_activity_id, s.sectorname;
